data.title: US Biden Trump rally reax
data.meta_description:
EBU-2024_10245208: Biden says this is "sick" as he reacts to shots being fired at Trump

RESTRICTIONS
EBU Members, Sublicensees, and EBU Radio Only Members are defined here:
https://www.ebu.ch/eurovision-news/news-exchange-participants
EBU Members requiring specific information about the USPOOL agreement with EBU should contact:
evn@eurovision.net

NO DISTRIBUTION TO THIRD PARTIES
NO ACCESS ON PLATFORMS AND SERVICES THAT ARE PRIMARILY DIRECTED AT AUDIENCES IN NORTH AMERICA

•	EBU MEMBERS: NEWS ACCESS ONLY (TV, RADIO, AND ALL PROPRIETARY PLATFORMS FOR WHICH THE MEMBER HAS EDITORIAL CONTROL AND LEGAL RESPONSIBILITY)
•	SUBLICENSEES: NO ACCESS
•	ASBU / ASIAVISION: NO ACCESS
•	EBU RADIO ONLY MEMBERS: AUDIO ACCESS ONLY
•	NO USE OR ARCHIVE OF STANDALONE ITEMS AFTER THE TERM OF THE AGREEMENT (CURRENT END DATE: 15 JANUARY 2025). PROGRAMMES PRODUCED USING MATERIAL DURING THE TERM MAY BE ARCHIVED AND/OR REPUBLISHED
•	NO ACCESS ANY COUNTRY, REGION OR SO-CALLED STATE THAT IS IDENTIFIED BY THE OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL AS RESTRICTING TRADE SUBJECT TO USA SANCTION AND / OR IDENTIFIED UNDER THE TRADING WITH THE ENEMY ACT AT ANY TIME DURING THE TERM AS NOTIFIED BY CBS (USCBSN) / ABC United States (USABC) / NBC (USNBC)

Rights of use may be withdrawn under special circumstances.
Participants must immediately cease usage and withdraw content from all platforms and remove it from their archive.

Copyright belongs to the source unless otherwise specified.

Additional restrictions may apply.
If there is any conflict between these restrictions and the additional restrictions, the additional restrictions will prevail.
